com.primus.searchstudio
Class Categories

java.lang.Object
  com.primus.searchstudio.Categories
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Categories
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Collection to store the categories (aka topics) for a given or search request. This object comprises a collection of individual Category objects.

See Also:
